why do you recompile? ndiswrapper should work just like that if you install ndiswrapper-utils.
did you do modprobe ndiswrapper and then do the configuration?

I suggest you do this: 'sudo apt-get install ndiswrapper-utils' (expect this to say "already the newest...". Then just enter 'sudo modprobe ndiswrapper' and see if the interface appears. If not, reinstall your driver.
compiling *should* not be necessary.
view compiling as a last resort.
